General.Name: Atom Empreendimentos e Participações S.A
General.Description: Atom Empreendimentos e Participações S.A. operates in the financial market sector in Brazil. It provides trading educational courses and trainings for traders; and publishes teaching materials for traders, as well as operates Traders Desk. The company was formerly known as ATOM Participações S.A. Atom Empreendimentos e Participações S.A. was founded in 1994 and is based in Sorocaba, Brazil.
General.Address: R. Messías Pereira De Paula, 333, Sorocaba, SP, Brazil, 18046-640

0.Name: Ms. Ana Carolina Paifer
